sentences.sContent: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.sCn: 请等一下你的血红蛋白化验结果。

sentences.sContent: The reconstructed mammoth hemoglobin could deliver oxygen at colder temperatures than the human form of the protein could handle.
sentences.sContent_eng: The reconstructed mammoth hemoglobin could deliver oxygen at colder temperatures than the human form of the protein could handle.
sentences.sCn: 重建的猛犸血红蛋白与人类的血红蛋白相比，能够在耕地的温度下运送氧气。

sentences.sContent: A five-membered heterocyclic ring compound, C4H5N, having an odor similar to chloroform. It is the parent compound of hemoglobin, chlorophyll, and many other complex, biologically active substances.
sentences.sContent_eng: A five-membered heterocyclic ring compound, C4H5N, having an odor similar to chloroform. It is the parent compound of hemoglobin, chlorophyll, and many other complex, biologically active substances.
sentences.sCn: 叽咯一种五倍杂环混合物，C4H5N，气味与三氯甲烷相似，是血红蛋白，叶绿素和其他多种复杂的生物性活跃的物质的亲体混合物。

trans.tranCn: 【生化】 血红蛋白， 血色素
trans.tranOther: Haemoglobin is the red substance in blood, which combines with oxygen and carries it around the body
